        public RPCServer()
          throws java.io.IOException,

    • Method Detail

      • createGroupAndJoinIt

        public java.lang.String createGroupAndJoinIt(java.lang.String groupId,
                                             java.lang.String userId)
        Creates a group for a tour instance and joins it.
        Parameters:
        groupId - id of the user.
        userId - id of the participant.
        Returns:
        an URL, which is used to connect to the infrastructure for the group communication dedicated to the visit.

      • joinAGroup

        public java.lang.String joinAGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
                                   java.lang.String userId)
        Joins a group for a tour instance, that is a visit.
        Parameters:
        groupId - id of the group.
        userId - id of the participant.
        Returns:
        returns an URL, which is used to connect to the infrastructure for the dedicated group communication.

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException,

        closes the channel and the connection with the broker.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - communication problem.

        the main method of the example.
